description:
Agenda:

6.00 pm  Arrival and drinks

6.30 pm  Presentations (followed by networking and drinks)

• Speaker #1: Spatial Network Analysis - Crispin Cooper, Cardiff University

• Speaker #2: Data analysis in the charitable sector - Chloe Parker, Core Insights

• Speaker #3: Machine Learning and IBM Data Science Experience - Christopher Snow, IBM: In this session, Chris will talk machine learning and IBM DSX. Chris provides a high level intro to Collaborative Filtering using Apache Spark's ALS (alternating least squares) machine learning algorithm. He then walks through an example collaborative filtering web app for movie recommendations. The sample app is built using various Bluemix services incl Spark as a Service, Cloudant, Compose Redis and IBM's Data Science Experience (DSX). Chris briefly covers each of these services and the properties they bring to the application architecture.

If you're on Twitter you can use the official hashtag: #BristolDS
title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
